frontmatter.title: Using the Rancher Command Line Interface
frontmatter.description: The Rancher CLI is a unified tool that you can use to interact with Rancher. With it, you can operate Rancher using a command line interface rather than the GUI

frontmatter.title: Rancher v2.0-v2.4
frontmatter.description: Rancher adds significant value on top of Kubernetes: managing hundreds of clusters from one interface, centralizing RBAC, enabling monitoring and alerting. Read more.
